title: Step Configuration
description: Event step configuration for feeding reminder background job with proper subscriptions and emissions.

title: Event Subscription
description: Subscribes to 'ts.feeding.reminder.enqueued' events to process feeding reminder setup.

title: Feeding Reminder Handler
description: Core business logic for setting up feeding reminders and welcome messages for new pets.

title: Pet Update Logic
description: Updates pet records with feeding schedules, welcome notes, and next feeding timestamps.

title: Logging
description: Comprehensive logging for monitoring feeding reminder setup and error handling.

title: Not Found Handling
description: Handles cases where pet is not found during feeding reminder setup.
